content.html: Why not? I'm currently at 4200-4300 contribs last year, and it's mostly about the way you work. If you work on one huge PR spanning weeks or squash commits, you'll end up with 10% of that max. We try to keep PRs atomic and also the history in place for meaningful annotations.
content.value:
Why not? I'm currently at 4200-4300 contribs last year, and it's mostly about the way you work. If you work on one huge PR spanning weeks or squash commits, you'll end up with 10% of that max.

We try to keep PRs atomic and also the history in place for meaningful annotations.
